# PED::SET_PED_WETNESS_ENABLED_THIS_FRAME

## Summary
Enables a non-player ped to get wet this frame from systems that it otherwise wouldn't (e.g. particle effects)

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped: Index - the index of the ped that is allowed to get wet this frame

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
combined with PED::SET_PED_WETNESS_HEIGHT(), this native makes the ped drenched in water up to the height specified in the other function
